meanings.definition: To rise or float in the air, especially by means of supernatural or magical power.
meanings.sent1: The magician was levitating above the stage during the performance.
meanings.sent2: She was levitating effortlessly, showcasing her magical abilities.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried levitating after watching a wizard on TV.
meanings.sent4: His spirit felt like it was levitating with joy after receiving good news.
meanings.sent5: The image of the superhero levitating in the sky was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: The act of rising or floating in the air, especially by means of supernatural or magical power.
meanings.sent1: Witnessing the levitating of objects in the haunted house was both scary and fascinating.
meanings.sent2: The levitating of the ghostly figure left everyone in awe.
meanings.sent3: The levitating of the cupcakes at the party surprised the guests.
meanings.sent4: The levitating of emotions in the room made it feel surreal.
meanings.sent5: The levitating of the spaceship in the movie was a thrilling scene.
